1275.question: what are the state of the art methods?

4-Table2-1.png: LSTM, Joint LSTM unidirectional, LSTM+B, LSTM+VGG, LSTM+Flow, LSTM+Flow+AlexNet, LSTM+B+VGG, LSTM+B+VGG+Flow, LSTM+B+VGG+Flow+AlexNet, LSTM+B+VGG+Flow+AlexNet+Yo-U, LSTM+B+VGG+Flow+AlexNet+Yo-U+Joint-BLSYM reinforced (ours).

1275.answer: S2VT, RGB (VGG), RGB (VGG)+Flow (AlexNet), LSTM-E (VGG), LSTM-E (C3D) and Yao et al.
